name: Lights - Circles
description:
Create your very own universe at your fingertips!

Collect stars to create your universe, and share it with your friends.
Let your planets fly across the screen, and your planets will collect the stars by simply touching them.
Your planets will fly faster as you collect more stars. Also you may magically swap you planets around by just tapping them.

Have fun creating your universe!

- No internet connection is required to play.
- This app is completely free!
